captions.text: Are you even listening to me?
Yeah, yeah! No, yeah that sounds great. Tell me more.
(From the other room) YOU SON OF A BITCH!
They're exchanging tons of fire right?
They all have pistols. Like this one.
Oh no, no. It's okay. This ones not loaded.
Yeah, that sounds great. Tell me more.

Okay good, well they pull out all these guns,
right? And they have this tremendous shoot out.
Bown, remind me to ask Ollie for some guns.

So, they're exchanging tons of fire right?
And they all have pistols like this one.
Bown, remind me to ask Ollie for some guns.
So, they're exchanging tons of fir-
Oh no, no. It's okay, this ones not loaded.

Okay so one of the characters pulls out one
of his guns and goes.

So, they're exchanging tons of fire right?
They all have pistols like this one.
Oh no, no. That's okay, this ones not loaded.

Okay so one of the characters pulls out one
of his guns and goes.
Why aren't you wearing any trousers?
(Trousers) I'M GONNA EAT YOUR LEGS BING!!

comments.text:
Let me Explain What happens here: So a guy (let's call him Ted.) is getting 
ready for his day when (what i can only assume) is the I LOVE IT horse 
tells him he's gonna eat his legs. Hours later in a different appartment, 
Ted is telling his friend (we'll call him.. Bill!) about an idea for 
something. He mentions how guns are involved and tells his other friend 
(who is preparing toast) to remind him to get some guns. While distracted 
and looking away at Ted, he puts a gun in the toaster. So Ted picks up an 
unloaded gun (still acting out the idea from earlier) and tells his friend 
to stand up, knocking over a cup of water onto the outlet that the toaster 
is plugged into. With Bill standing up he puts the gun to his chest and 
acts out a person killing him ("So then he's like 'YOU SON OF A BITCH!'"). 
At that moment, the toasters gun pops out and the electricity from the 
shorted out outlet ignites it. Shooting Bill in the process. Meanwhile 
another friend playing video games (how about Jason?) hears Ted yelling 
''YOU SON OF A BITCH!'' and starts running over to see the dead body of 
Bill, with Ted and Toaster Guy both acting like they killed him.﻿
